Hi John,

My name is Brian Garofola and I’m an engineering director at CDK Global (formerly ADP Dealer Services). We were a large, early adopter of AngularJS and have used it in a large ecosystem for over 2 years. We also sponsor the AngularJS Chicago Meetup group which is now closing in on 1,000 members. In mid-December, we are trying to plan a hackathon for the Meetup group and want it to be a great event. We’re going to get some space in downtown Chicago, have some food & beer, and give away some great prizes. I wanted to see if you were interested in coming to judge the event. We’re hoping that having some well-known names in the AngularJS space would help create an event better event. Please let me know if you, or anyone else you know, might be interested. Thanks and I look forward to speaking with you.
